tiles.name: Source queue: Age of oldest message
Source queue: Number of events in queue
Producer queues: Age of oldest message
Producer queues: Number of events in queue
Producer queues: Events ingested (per second, top)
Producer queues: Events ingested (per second, line)
Markdown
tiles.markdown:
In [the AWS docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/firehose/latest/dev/monitoring-with-cloudwatch-metrics.html#fh-splunk-metrics), data freshness is defined as

_Age (from getting into Amazon Data Firehose to now) of the oldest record in Amazon Data Firehose. Any record older than this age has been delivered to Splunk_

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown: Each Firehose stream provides the following combined quota... 100,000 records/second, 1,000 requests/second, and 1 MiB/second - see [here](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/firehose/latest/dev/limits.html#:~:text=When%20Direct%20PUT%20is%20configured%20as%20the%20data%20source)
